CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 22, 1947, pg. 34, reads: "Trio - Shown, left to right, are: Mayor David L. Lawrence, Commissioner John J. Kane, and Father Charles Owen Rice. Appreciation was shown Father Rice for his unselfish work in providing food and shelter for homeless men on Tuesday evening at a dinner held in the Hotel William Penn in his honor. Approximately 1,000 persons attended the dinner. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, Commissioner John J. Kane, and Father Charles Owen Rice seated at banquet table for dinner in Rice's honor at William Penn Hotel
